name: Camacho - Ecuador BXP - Robusto
additionalNotes: Dylan Austin, VP of Camacho, explained that in creating the new BXP version of their popular blends he decided to add more broadleaf to each filler blend. An intense taste experience. A medium to full-bodied palate of pepper, light floral notes and citrus undertones is mixed with a hit of black pepper to give you a thrilling experience like no other. This is a cigar that performs exceptionally cigar after cigar.
